channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-16329] TopN: use local executor info for LLAP memory checks
item.description:
// TODO: For LLAP, assumption is off-heap cache.
      final long memoryUsedPerExecutor = (memoryMXBean.getHeapMemoryUsage().getUsed() / numExecutors);
      // this is total free memory available per executor in case of LLAP
      totalFreeMemory = conf.getMaxMemoryAvailable() - memoryUsedPerExecutor;

exec.TopNHash: isTez parameters -615768144 = 5312782848 - 71142611912 / 12

This turns off the TopNHash entirely causing something trivial like 

select c_custkey, count(1) from customer group by c_custkey limit 10;

To shuffle 30M rows instead of 10.
item.summary: TopN: use local executor info for LLAP memory checks

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: The issue is immediately resolved if a full GC is triggered via jmap -histo:live

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:

Seems related:

Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Map operator initialization failed
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.tez.MapRecordProcessor.init(MapRecordProcessor.java:354)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.tez.TezProcessor.initializeAndRunProcessor(TezProcessor.java:184)
	... 15 more
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.llap.LlapDaemonInfo.getNumExecutors(LlapDaemonInfo.java:59)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.GroupByOperator.initializeOp(GroupByOperator.java:407)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.Operator.initialize(Operator.java:366)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.Operator.initialize(Operator.java:556)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.Operator.initializeChildren(Operator.java:508)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.Operator.initialize(Operator.java:376)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.Operator.initialize(Operator.java:556)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.Operator.initializeChildren(Operator.java:508)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.Operator.initialize(Operator.java:376)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.MapOperator.initializeMapOperator(MapOperator.java:501)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.tez.MapRecordProcessor.init(MapRecordProcessor.java:317)
On the patch itself - where isLlap flag is used, should it access it via the LlapDaemonInfo static, and not from wherever it get this now?
sershe: That's a good idea, because this currently breaks in hybrid mode.
